page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Network || Load Balancer as a Service

incidents.name: [GRA][Managed Private Registry] - All customers registries
incidents.message: Start Time : 24/03/2022 15:00 UTC End Time : 25/03/2022 23:30 UTC Service impact : Some registries had instabilities that could sometimes triggers registry reboot. Before, and during, the registry reboot, the customer couldn't access to his registry (pulling/pushing docker images and helm charts). Root cause : A software component was generating instability on the platform.
